display_long_description:
Welcome to Handtastic!

Get ready to embark on a thrilling hand-powered adventure like no other! Grab, climb, and leap your way through a colorful world filled with exciting challenges and hilarious antics.

In Handtastic, you take control of adorable creatures with capsule-formed bodies, lively arms, and insatiable curiosity. Step into their wacky world, where the competition is fierce and the fun is endless.

Engage in heart-pumping multiplayer matches across a variety of whimsical maps. Race to the finish line and outlast your opponents in your quest for hand-powered glory.

Join forces with friends in our spaceship-themed lobby, where you can team up, strategize, and dive into the action together. Embrace the silliness, enjoy the colorful visuals, and groove to the upbeat soundtracks that will keep your spirits high.

So, are you ready to unleash the power of your hands?

It's time to go hand-in-hand with excitement and embark on an unforgettable adventure in Handtastic!
